fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of ʿUmar, the second caliph

fullname: Ḥamzah ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
searchname: Hamzah ibn Abdullāh ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
info: Son of Ābdullāh ibn ʿUmar and therefore nephew of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar

fullname: Ṣafiyyah bint Abi ʿUbayd ibn Masʿūd al-Thaqafi
info: Wife of Ābdullāh ibn ʿUmar and therefore sister-in-law of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar

fullname: Jābir ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿAmr ibn Thaʿlabah
searchname: Jabir ibn Abdullāh ibn Amr ibn Thalabah
notes: hafsah's student's student - he wasn't able to participate in the battle of badr acc to muslimscholars so subhanAllah he narrated this hadith from Hafsah

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri
searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri
notes: student's student's student - sometimes referred to as muhammad ibn muslim, sometimes az-zhuri, sometimes ibn shihab, sometimes ibn shihab az-zuhri

info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam
Brother of ʿAbdullāh ibn Ṣafwān, the student of Ḥafsah bint ʿUmar

fullname: Nāfiʿ Abu ʿAbdullāh Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar
searchname: Nafi Abu Abdullah Mawla Ibn Umar

fullname: Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Um ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Um Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: She helped Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar wash the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ

fullname: ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn Ḥafṣ ibn ʿĀṣim ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
searchname: Ubaydullah ibn Umar ibn Hafs ibn Asim ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
info: Great-great-great grandson of ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
